article.title: Comparing binary files
article.para: WinMerge can detect whether files are in text or binary format. When you launch a file compare operation on two binary files, WinMerge opens each file in the binary file editor. For the binary file editor to be operational, WinMerge requires installation of Frhed 1.6.0 or later. Be sure to run the Frhed setup to get things registered the proper way. Unzipping Frhed binaries doesn't suffice.
